issues.explanation:
Uppercase letters in filenames cause URL inconsistency and case-sensitivity 
issues across different platforms.

Current:  API_Guide.md
Suggested: api_guide.md

Why this matters:
  • Hugo converts filenames to URL slugs
  • Case sensitivity varies by OS (Linux vs macOS/Windows)
  • Creates inconsistent user experience
Markdown files should have YAML frontmatter with required fields (tags, categories, id)
issues.fix: Add frontmatter with tags: [], categories: [], and id fields
